subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
“To watch; to observe” (Pronunciation 1) > “watchtower; platform; temple” (Pronunciation 2).

{{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} connects it with {{och-l|侯|target}} and {{och-l|候|to watch; to be on the lookout for; to wait}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[observe]]; to [[watch]]; to [[view]]; to [[see]]
# to [[observe]] closely; to [[scrutinise]]; to [[investigate]]
# to [[read]]; to [[peruse]]
# to [[display]]; to [[show]]
# to [[visit]]; to [[go]] [[sightseeing]]
# to [[play]]; to [[enjoy]]
# [[appearance]]; [[looks]]
# [[sight]]; [[view]]; [[perspective]]
# [[concept]]; [[outlook]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
